name: Audio Downloader
description: Downloads audio from any URL on websites and platforms supported by yt-dlp and converts it to MP3 at 192kbps quality.
author: @@official.shinkai

filename.description: Optional custom base filename for the output MP3 file (without extension)

url.description: The URL to download audio from (any platform or website supported by yt-dlp).

audio_path.description: The full path to the downloaded MP3 file
